text.jpText:
ついにシニア級での夏合宿が始まる！
秋の決戦、『エリザベス女王杯』に向けて、
熱い夏にすることをメジロドーベルと誓った！
text.enText:
At last, the summer training camp at the 
senior class begins! We promised Mejiro 
Dobel that we would have a hot summer to 
prepare for the fall decisive race, "Queen 
Elizabeth Cup"! Mejiro Dobel and I vowed 
to make it a hot summer!
